verbs.description: [ARG0: Immigration advocates] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: held] [ARG1: rallies] [ARGM-LOC: in the Bay Area and across the nation] [ARGM-CAU: in protest against a Trump administration policy that separates some undocumented immigrant families] .

Immigration advocates on Thursday held rallies in the Bay Area and across the nation in protest against [ARG0: a Trump administration policy] [R-ARG0: that] [V: separates] [ARG1: some undocumented immigrant families] .
